###Keyword###
With...EndWith

###Description###
Used to reduce long references to object type variables


###Syntax###
<b>With</b> &lt;expression&gt;
	<i>statements</i>
	...
<b>EndWith</b>


###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
expression
	Must be an object type expression
@@End@@


###Remarks###
With...EndWith statements may NOT be nested.

###Related###
<a href="ForInNext.htm">For...In...Next</a>
